RstoxBase 1.2.25
  • Reference

Biotic PSU

Source: R/Define.R
DefineBioticPSU.Rd

This function defines the BioticPSU process data, linking strata, biotic PSUs and Stations

DefineBioticPSU(
  processData,
  UseProcessData = FALSE,
  StratumPolygon,
  StoxBioticData,
  DefinitionMethod = c("StationToPSU", "None")
)

Arguments

processData

The current data produced by a previous instance of the function.
UseProcessData

Logical: If TRUE use the existing function output in the process.
StratumPolygon

The StratumPolygon process data.
StoxBioticData

The StoxBioticData data (defined in RstoxData).
DefinitionMethod

Character: A string naming the method to use, one of "StationToPSU", which sets each Station as a PSU, and "None" for pure manual actions by the user.

Value

An object of StoX data type BioticPSU.

Details

This function is awesome and does excellent stuff.

See also

Acousic PSUs are generated using DefineAcousticPSU. For the vertical resolution (Layer) see DefineBioticLayer and DefineAcousticLayer.

Examples

x <- 1
